If you're looking for conversation ideas, we could talk about hobbies, travel, current events, personal goals, pop culture, food, or career. Is there anything in particular that interests you?
如果你想找些話題來聊天，我們可以談談嗜好、旅遊、時事、個人目標、流行文化、美食或職業。有沒有什麼特別的你感興趣的呢？告訴我吧！
As a close-knit team of friends with diverse talents and a shared passion for event planning, we collaborate to design and organize private parties that are truly one-of-a-kind and unforgettable.
作為一個密切合作、擁有各種才華和共同熱愛活動策劃的團隊，我們合作設計和組織真正獨一無二、令人難忘的私人派對。
The list will be updated periodically. Sorting is based on name, role and role count.
名單將定期更新。排序基於姓名、會員級別和級別數量。
We have built various standardized processes to build events that are more reliable and suited for the majority of people in order to make events function more smoothly and efficiently.
我們建立了各種標準化流程，以建立更可靠、更適合大多數人的活動，使活動運作更順暢、更高效。
Develop initial event details, including location, number of participants, date, and time.
制定初始活動細節，包括地點、參與人數、日期和時間。
Ask all members if they choose to participate and make adjustments to satisfy the majority.
詢問所有成員是否選擇參與並進行調整以滿足大多數人的需求。
Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate and adjust to satisfy the majority
跟進未回應的成員，詢問是否選擇參與並進行調整以滿足大多數人的需求。
Carry out the details that have been agreed upon, such as reservations and confirmation.
執行已經達成共識的細節，例如預訂和確認。
Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate (without adjusting event details).
跟進未回應的成員，詢問是否選擇參與（不調整活動細節）。
Notify all members of the event details and any changes that have been made.
通知所有成員有關活動細節和任何已經進行的更改。
